author: Nintendo of America
description:
Lost Hellden is coming soon to Nintendo Switch.

Resist your Sin and reclaim your fate in this beautifully hand-painted 3D JRPG.

#NintendoSwitch #LostHelldenVisit

author: Nintendo of America
description:
BALL x PIT is coming to Nintendo Switch on Oct 15, 2025 and later this fall on Nintendo Switch 2! 

The front line's first defense. With over a dozen playable characters, descending into the pit as The Shieldbearer is where offense and defense become one.  

#NintendoSwitch #NintendoSwitch2 #BALLxPIT 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

title: BALL x PIT – The Shieldbearer Gameplay Trailer – Nintendo Switch

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Disney Dreamlight Valley’s latest update is now available on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/disney-dreamlight-valley-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01   
 
Visit Riley's Headquarters and befriend Disney and Pixar's Joy and Sadness. Unlock a mysterious new Realm door to visit Riley's Headquarters, where Joy and Sadness will need your help to put on a marvelous new Dream Production! After giving them a helping hand, they will join the Valley and help your Villagers reconnect with their emotions.
 
Reminisce about past summers with the Retro Roadtrip Star Path! Find summer memories and spend time with Joy and Sadness to unlock retro Dream Styles, road-tripping decorations, and nostalgic costumes for you and your companions.
 
#NintendoSwitch #DisneyDreamlightValleyVisit

 Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twi
title: Disney Dreamlight Valley – Emotional Rescue Update Trailer – Nintendo Switch

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Shantae Advance: Risky Revolution is available now on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/shantae-advance-risky-revolution-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01   


Experience an adventure 20 years in the making as Shantae hair-whips and belly-dances through scrambled lands, misplaced towns, monster-filled crypts, and daunting labyrinths to stop Risky Boots’ twisted scheme. Six creature transformations, fierce boss battles, and a 4-player Battle Mode await!  

#NintendoSwitch #ShantaeAdvance  

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s
